Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Due to a power supply problem, tomorrow's event of the final presentation will be in the 9th Floor of the main building in the meeting room (from the elevator on the left).   Also please do not forget to upload your presentations on Isis until the end of this day.  Kind regards,  Niko

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear all, On Thursday, July 11, 2024, we will meet at TU Berlin in room H7173/74 for the final presentation. The groups are divided as follows: Group A: 10:00 am (sharp) - 12:30 pm (please arrive at 9:45) Group B: 01:30 pm (sharp) - 03:00 pm (please arrive at 13:15) You can find the overview of your timeslot here on Isis. Please make sure to arrive on time to ensure a prompt start. Please ensure that you upload your slides one day ahead here on Isis. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. Best of luck with the preparation of your presentations and the report. Kind regards, Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Quick reminder that our Intermediate Presentation will take place tomorrow at PwC. Don't forget to upload your presentations as pdf by today. Make sure to name the file in the following order: TopicNumber_TopicName_StudentName1_StudentName2 . A schedule for the presentation order can also be found in this course. Best regards, Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear students, The intermediate presentations will take place next Friday, May 24, 2024, at the PwC office. We look forward to see all of you there. Please note the following details for the event: Group A: 10:15  - 12:30 (please arrive a few minutes earlier to ensure a prompt start) Lunch :    12:30  - 13:30 (for all groups) Group B: 13:30  - 15:30 (please join us for lunch beforehand) Address: PwC Office Kapelle-Ufer 4, 10117 Berlin  Please upload your presentation slides by thursday 23.05. If you have any questions don't hesitate to reach out. Best of luck with the preparation of your presentations! Kind regards, Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Due to organizational reasons, the final presentation has been scheduled for July 11th. Please mark this date in your calendars. Best wishes with your preparations for the Intermediate Presentation. Kind regards, Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear students, We would like to remind you that all students, including Erasmus students, must complete their online registration via MTS by May 10, 2024. Best regards, Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear all, thank you so much for participating in the Kick-Off Meeting on Friday, it was very nice to meet you all! And thank you as well for stating your preferences.  I have published the results and uploaded a list with all email addresses. Please get in touch with each other and then contact your mentor proactively.  Kind regards, Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear students, welcome to the course Crisis Management meets Consulting ! On Friday 26.04. we will have our Kick-Off Meeting in Room H7173/74 at TU Berlin (Hauptgebäude). We will have two working groups separated in the morning and in the afternoon: Group A Kickoff: 10am - 12:30pm Group B Kickoff: 2:00pm - 4:30pm Here you can find to which group you belong and therefore the time you have to be present. If you have any questions please sent me an email or a private message on ISIS.  We are looking forward to meeting you all! Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear students, Thank you for the numerous applications.  The students who have fulfilled the requirements for participation have been notified personally. The students who did not receive a confirmation will not be able to participate. The division into groups A&B will be announced on Monday, April 22nd on the Isis course page.  Since there are still a open spots available, we are opening the opportunity to apply until this Friday, April 19.  If there are any questions regarding the application or further process feel free to ask. Kind regards, Niko Diedrich

Messages.Author: Elias Nikolas Maria Diedrich
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Welcome to this year's CMC course. Please note that an application is required to participate by April 12, 2024. Please send your application documents (letter of motivation, max. 1 page, CV, grade overview) as one PDF document to: Niko Diedrich, e.diedrich@campus.tu-berlin.de. Best regards, Niko Diedrich
